title: Programming Legalese MCP
description: Machine Coded Principle for our programming legalese.

principles.name: Highly Structured JavaScript for Type Annotation
principles.description: Our programming legalese, characterized by highly structured JavaScript, inherently annotates type through its consistent and explicit structural patterns. This approach ensures clarity, predictability, and facilitates static analysis without relying solely on formal type annotation syntax.
benefits: Clearer communication of data structures and interfaces
